name: py-sphinx-prompt

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Sphinx directive to add unselectable prompt.

dependencies.name: py-docutils
dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-poetry-dynamic-versioning
dependencies.description: Plugin for Poetry to enable dynamic versioning based on VCS tags.

dependencies.name: py-poetry-plugin-tweak-dependencies-version
dependencies.description: Poetry plugin used to tweak dependency versions.

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-toolbox
dependent_to.description: Box of handy tools for Sphinx.
